程序包 com.elseforif.servlet.utility

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    HTMLConstants
    This class contains constants for generating HTML strings.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    HTMLFlexiWriter
    This class wraps the 'print...()' methods in HTMLWriter with methods returning strings, rather than writing them directly to the output.
    HTMLWriter
    This object represents an alternative to JSPs and other Web-UI frameworks.
    StyleSheet
    This encapsulates a CSS style sheet, storing style in a map of maps, which allows for any number of styles, each containing any number of attributes.
